DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose of this trial is: - to determine complete response rate (CRR) after six cycles of chemotherapy - to determine complete remission rate (CR/CRr) as final treatment outcome after completion of treatment
DOC.brief_title: Targeted BEACOPP Variants in Patients With Newly Diagnosed Advanced Classical Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Histologically proven classical Hodgkin lymphoma First diagnosis, no previous treatment, age: 1860 years Stage IIB with large mediastinal mass and/or extranodal lesions, stage III or IV disease Composite lymphoma or nodular lymphocyte predominant Hodgkin lymphoma (NLPHL) Previous malignancy Prior chemotherapy or radiation
